summary: first thing that popped into my mind for headcanons was lucas and eliott adopting a pet together in the future when they have...
question: first thing that popped into my mind for headcanons was lucas and eliott adopting a pet together in the future when they have their own apartment :') i'm thinking a dog but i can see eliott being a cat person too
answer:
this hasn’t been proof read, once again. really, this is just “word vomit and hope for the best” kind of writing, i’m really sorry. hope you like anyway :’)

— they both know that they want a dog sometime in the future; when they’ve settled down together, in an apartment that allows pets and when it’s more practical and reasonable.

—until they do, they’re both the weirdest dog people, always sending each other snaps of dogs they see on the street, in the metro, in the park. when they’re together they do it too, pointing out dogs making comments like “he kinda looks like you with that adorable grumpy face,” or “eliott, eliott, i want that dog, and i want ten of them!”

— it turns into years of both of them obsessing about wanting to get a dog together but it’s just never the right time. there are always so many practical reasons not to get one; it takes a lot of responsibility, time and money to get a dog, after all, none of which they seem to have with school, jobs, and moving apartments.

— when the “right time” finally arrives; the two of them living in a relatively big enough apartment that actually allows pets, both of them in uni and with jobs and a steady income, they barely realise it. it ends up being almost a year after they’ve moved in when they realise.

— they’re at the park when it happens; lucas sitting in between eliott’s legs, watching the people passing by when suddenly a couple with a young boy and a curly haired golden doodle pass by them. “one day when we finally get a dog, i want one of those,” lucas tells him.

eliott hums not really paying much attention, too busy enjoying the feel of the sun on his face and lucas’ fingers running up and down his arms.

“wait, babe,” eliott freezes. it makes lucas turn around in his arms. “we could get a dog now,” he says, looking lucas in the eyes, seeing when the realisation hits him as well. “oh my god, we can get a dog, eliott!”

— after that, they regularly start scouring the shelter websites, both of them in agreement that they’d rather get a rescue dog that’s in need of a home.

— they’re well into planning and both definitely in the agreement of getting a dog, so when lucas one day comes home and hears the sound of tiny meowing from their apartment… it’s a shock, to say the least. he carefully steps into their apartment, closing the door behind himself and toeing off his shoes. “eliott?” he calls out.

“no, shh, you have to be quiet,” he hears eliott saying, followed by more meowing. when lucas finds eliott in their bedroom, eliott turns around and greets him, overly enthusiastic for a rainy tuesday afternoon.

“hi babe, how was your da—“

“eliott, what’s under your sweatshirt?”

“nothing. there’s nothing under my sweatshirt. i don’t kno—“

"then why is it meowing?” eliott takes a deep breath, giving in as he realises there’s no getting out of the situation. "okay, don’t be mad …” he says just as a tiny, grey and ruffled kitten pokes his head out of the neck in eliott’s sweatshirt.

“you got a kitten,” lucas says, still in disbelief.

“i got a kitten.” eliott repeats.

— as it turns out the kitten was one eliott found wet and freezing in the gutter, “someone just left her there, lucas,” and lucas really can’t be mad seeing the adorable and ruffled fur, almost as wild as eliott’s hair when he gets out of the shower.

— “just look at her, lucas. how could i not take her home?” eliott asks and lucas just shakes his head, already a little in love with the tiny kitten and very much in love with his idiot boyfriend.

— they also adopt a dog (and another one a few years later) 🐶

summary: We need more jealous eliott! Like maybe eliott sees chloe trying to be friends with lucas now that yann and her are together,...
question: We need more jealous eliott! Like maybe eliott sees chloe trying to be friends with lucas now that yann and her are together, but eliott just sees red and amps up the pda to 1000% to show her lucas is his baby and no one elses. Bonus if there's dirty dancing/handsy eliott involved. And basically eliott using every excuse to say "my boyfriend" or "my lucas" or my baby
answer: Hi dearie!! I wrote up the fic and ^surprise^ it’s a three-part story. I was hyped while writing this at midnight lmao. Please enjoy 💕

summary: Chat between Imane and Alexia - May 23 Alexia: any news from the casting? still nothing for me, it must be a no Imane: me...
body:
Chat between Imane and Alexia - May 23

Alexia: any news from the casting?
still nothing for me, it must be a no
Imane: me neither…but yeah you’re right I think…
Alexia: but they could warn us though idk it’s weird
Imane: it’s the cruel law of showbusiness…
Alexia: lol

blog.name: srodvlv
blog.title: be kind.
blog.description: i've been here for over 8 years. sorry for the mess. current hyperfixation: #skamfrance.

summary: The "I would like to get my daughter back" line kind of rub me the wrong way tbh ? I understand where he's coming from and I...
question: The "I would like to get my daughter back" line kind of rub me the wrong way tbh ? I understand where he's coming from and I rlly love the character but . I feel that the anger that Imane is displaying is just a part of here ? He didn't lose his daughter, he's just seeing a part of her he didn't see before. It's Imane dark side, the bottled up emotion, the lies, the anger but it's still Imane at the end of the day and idk it's part of being a human. It would have hurt tbh lmao
answer:
Yeah, I get what you mean, I agree. He’s used to another side of Imane, a softer maybe, more opened side, so he has a hard time reconciling the two. 

If you’re referencing my tags were I said I loved the line, I was talking about “Ramadam is a time to get back to Allah and for introspection. For Allah, it’s up to you. But as for introspection, you do it”. Because he could have easily gone with “the way you are acting goes against our deepest muslim values and we can’t have that during Ramadam”. Instead, he reminded her of her faith without pressuring her or making it seem as if Allah would be disappointed in her. He just said “hey since you don’t/can’t talk to me, you can reach out to Allah if you want, or don’t, that’s up to you.” Which I loved. But he did insist on the introspection part, because I think he’s right, Imane does need to sort it all out, this darker side like you said is not healthy and can’t go on much longer.

I think Papa Bakhellal was telling her that he was there, her family was there, Allah was there, all of those were options and she could open up to them anytime, but he won’t force her and in the end, she has to decide for herlself and work out who she is or wants to be. Idk, I just really love Papa Bakhellal.

blog.name: nshallah
blog.title: Made In Lebanon
blog.description: Jennifer | 18 | Film Student

summary:
PART 3 - Find Part 2 here 
23:09 
He turns to find Lucas peaking his head through the door with a weary look.  
“You okay?”...
body:
PART 3 - Find Part 2 here

23:09

He turns to find Lucas peaking his head through the door with a weary look.

“You okay?” Lucas asks, entering the bedroom and closing the door behind him, giving them privacy.

Eliott exhales, going for the deep-end first.

“I’m just not so comfortable with Chloe here. I wanted to be alone for a bit to clear my head and thoughts so I could come back and be a better boyfriend.”

“A better boyfriend?”

“I don’t want to cause any problems.”

“You’re not causing anything. There’s nothing wrong with being jealous. I get it.”

Lucas gets closer to Eliott, leaning his head up to him for a better view of his face.

“I’m irresistible, what can you do about it?” he says.

Eliott snorts, dipping his head for a peck and pulling him in for a hug, finding his favorite spot to hide his head in. He snuggles Lucas, tickling his neck with his breath, making Lucas back away with a smile. He intertwines their fingers.

“Come back with me.”

23:37

The game’s over, but the night is far from that.

The boys ditched their consoles and their stale pizza slices and brought out Basile’s BOSE portable speaker to play music in the flat. The group needed a change of atmosphere.

The music blasting from the speakers is from Yann’s indie R&B playlist, as he is best known for curating acceptable music. The music flows nicely between slow and fast beats, letting Lucas and Eliott find their own balance in the tunes.

Lucas could tell Eliott is still a bit tense over Chloe’s presence, sneaking glances over at her and Yann, watching for her possible approach to the boys.

Lucas tightens his arms around Eliott’s waist, bringing his attention back to his boyfriend. Eliott turns to Lucas, tilting his head to bump their heads together, swaying to the music.

The track ends and the next one is a more upbeat song with a slightly sexier tune to it. With one last look at Chloe, Eliott caresses Lucas’ waist, descending his arms to his hips. He pinches Lucas’ hips then pulls him closer, allowing him to grind against his boyfriend, showing his growing hard-on. Lucas hums, tilting his head up to kiss Eliott, but Eliott has other plans.

Frustrated with his past behavior and the chaotic thoughts of Chloe raging in his head, he grabs Lucas from the waist and turns them around, shoving Lucas against the nearest wall. Lucas exhales a little laugh before finding his boyfriend’s lips.

“I might be a little territorial, sue me,” Eliott says between kisses.

“I’ll take another form of payment,” he whispers before sneaking his hand through the waistband of Eliott’s jeans.

“HOLA BITCHES!”

The couple break apart, finding Alexia barging into the room with the rest of the girl squad following in pursuit.

The girls wear mischievous smiles, and a bottle of vodka between them.

“Daphne!” Basile shrieks happily, rushing for his girl to embrace. Lucas looks around the room with a confused face, looking for Yann in the dim light. He finds him leaning against Chloe as they face the girl squad speaking with Arthur and Basile.

“Yann?” he asks while pointing to the girls.

“I can’t stand Basile pouting all night anymore. I texted Emma right after I called Chloe.”

Lucas nods with a tender smile, turning to Basile and Daphne embracing and swaying to the music.

Emma plants her butt on the couch. Alexia and Arthur talk and pass the vodka bottle between themselves. And Manon and Imane hold hands while bobbing their heads to the music.

Eliott pushes Lucas harder against the wall, bringing Lucas’ attention back to him. The couple are pretty much isolated in their little corner, where they nudge their heads together and sway to the music.

“I love you, I love you, I love you,” Lucas says. “No matter how petty or jealous you get. You’re the first in my eyes.”

Eliott crinkles his eyes with his big smile. He tilts Lucas’s head up and kisses his chin, then brings him in for the tightest hug.

summary:
He’s been doing this with at least one fan every meet up he has and wow we love a comedian™️. 
Translation:
“Axel, who are you...
body:
He’s been doing this with at least one fan every meet up he has and wow we love a comedian™️.

Translation:

“Axel, who are you looking for?”

“Alexa??? I’m looking for Alexa, you haven’t seen her?”

“Well, no.”

“Putain, I cant go on with the play without her. They told me Alexa was coming—ok, well Alexa, if you see this message, big kisses and I adore you [or I’m waiting for you].”
